answers.answer: Tylenol for now is really all you can take.. but if you talk to your doctor they can proscribe you something better if they dont go away with tylenol.. drink lots of water as well!
Tyneol is all you can take, try resting you'll feel better soon

tylonal you need to talk with your doctor about the headache  they say if you have a headach while pregnant then you need to see your doctor or something idk why but they should have given you a list of what you could ahave taken and everything

Yeah Tylenol is about it, make sure you are staying hydrated (water or Gatorade helps with that), also it could be lack of caffeine if you're used to drinking that on a regular basis, but the reason they watch for headaches is because it could be a sign of preeclampsia (pregnancy induced high blood pressure). So tell your doc.
